content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm thinking of 1500 Euro per month. Remember, this is a prime location in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. I'm a student and I'm looking for something more affordable. How about 1000 Euro per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's too low for me. This is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I can go down a bit, but not that much. How about 1400 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for me. I understand that the apartment is in a good location, but as a student, I have a limited budget. How about 1100 Euro per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's still too low. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure I can find someone who is willing to pay more. How about 1350 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but as a student, I have a limited budget. I can pay 1200 Euro per month. I hope that this offer meets your requirements.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding, but 1200 Euro per month is still too low for this apartment. How about 1325 Euro per month? This is the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my budget. I understand that 1325 Euro per month is a good price for this apartment. I agree to the price of 1325 Euro per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1325] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Emilia. I'm glad we could work something out. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in the apartment. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm sure this apartment will meet all my needs. If I have any questions or concerns, I'll be sure to contact you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
